txt.en:
'While you were away, Andreg sent a message to me. He came upon a grove where creatures of darkness haunt the Gravenwood.

'With your tale of the Cuthraul at the Tree of Tribute and your discovery of these tokens, it is clear that Gwyllion is near at hand. Go meet with Andreg and see what assistance he requires of you.

'You may find Andreg near a place called the Slade of Shadows some distance to the south.'
'It is good to see you, [placeholder]. If you peer around the rock to the south, you will see that trouble is brewing in this place... I have need of your aid.'
'Meet Andreg near the Slade of Shadows... he will have work for you, I am sure.'
The Rangers Saeradan, Amlan, and Andreg have tracked Gwyllion, the Old Woman of the Mountain, from the Windfells in Enedwaith to the Gravenwood of Dunland.
Talk to Andreg near the Slade of Shadows
Andreg is near the Slade of Shadows, some distance to the south of the Rohirrim scout-camp.\n\nSaeradan asked you to meet with Andreg and offer him your assistance.
